text: Beloved is a 1934 American drama movie directed by Victor Schertzinger and starring John Boles, Gloria Stuart, Morgan Farley, Ruth Hall, Albert Conti, Dorothy Peterson, Edmund Breese, Louise Carter, Walter Brennan, Oscar Apfel, Mickey Rooney, Richard Carle. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1934 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Victor Schertzinger Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Beloved (1934 movie)
